frame_id.description: Frame of reference for the image. The origin of the frame is the optical center of the camera. +x points to the right in the image, +y points down, and +z points into the plane of the image.

encoding.description:
Encoding of the raw image data

Supported values: `8UC1`, `8UC3`, `16UC1` (little endian), `32FC1` (little endian), `bayer_bggr8`, `bayer_gbrg8`, `bayer_grbg8`, `bayer_rggb8`, `bgr8`, `bgra8`, `mono8`, `mono16`, `rgb8`, `rgba8`, `uyvy` or `yuv422`, `yuyv` or `yuv422_yuy2`

step.description: Byte length of a single row
